Description:
The Perfect Family Entertainer
Situated in a sought after pocket of Corio, a quiet street, yet so convenient to everything the Northern Suburbs has to offer. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne only 50 minutes away, Geelong CBD only 15 minutes, Corio Shopping Centre only 5 minutes drive & local schools such as St Francis Xavier & Northern Bay College very close by.
* 4 bedrooms all with built in robes
* Master suite with ensuite and walk in robe and roller shutter
* Large kitchen with 900mm gas cooktop, wall oven, dishwasher & heaps of bench and cupboard space
* Adjoining dining/living area with wood fireplace, split system, skylight & doors leading out to extensive outdoor undercover area
* Second living area at the front of the home with roller shutter and brick feature wall
* Ducted heating throughout
* Double garage with internal access and rear access door with huge undercover carport leading to additional double garage/workshop
* Large 619sqm (approx.) block
Insights: 17 Browning Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Family Living At Its Finest"
Situated on a corner block in the highly sought after Cloverdale estate is this immaculately maintained family home. Lovingly owned, the home features 3 good-sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes plus a walk-in robe and recently renovated ensuite. Large light-filled living area leading you to the separate dining area and open plan kitchen with updated appliances. Outside is a fully enclosed outdoor entertaining area and a comfortable yard for the family to enjoy. Double garage plus a separate large single lock-up garage at the rear for caravans/trailers etc. Take advantage of all the added extras this home has to offer solar panels, ducted heating throughout, wall A/C's and ceiling fans just to name a few. All within walking distance to schools, kindergartens, shops & public transport readily available. 50 minutes drive to Melbourne CBD, 15 minutes to Geelong CBD and 25 minutes to some of Victoria's best beaches. Don't miss out!
-3 Bedrooms
-2 Bathrooms
-Built In Robes Throughout
-Heating and Cooling
-Solar Panels
-3 Car Garage
-Corner Block
-Perfect First Home/Investment Opportunity
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Prime Site - With An Abundance Of Opportunities
This large corner allotment is the land of opportunity with the multiple uses and flexibility to suit your needs. With permits in place for a 3 lot subdivision (no need to wait on council approval), or to build your own home on this generously proportioned site or perhaps a 2 lot subdivision maybe worth while investigating or you may look to take advantage of commercial possibilities being on a main road (stca). A substantial site of 645 sqm and great orientation with a north facing backyard so you can take full advantage of the sun and great passive energy. This handy location is close to the Ring Road access point, shops including Aldi, Woolies to Corio Central Shopping Centre, has schools close by, public transport plus health and wellness are only down the road. A flexible vacant land opportunity with loads of possibilities.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Sensational corner block.
A sensational investment opportunity, first home buyer's delight or a perfect property to move straight into that simply has it all! Charm, amazing location, free flowing floorplan and complete style throughout. Ideally positioned, only a short stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools, the Princes Highway for commuters and the Geelong CBD only 15 minutes drive. This home is nestled in a quiet street and oozes character. The home comprises three good size bedrooms, a spacious front lounge with split system air-conditioning and gas heating, updated central bathroom with single vanity, shower and bath. A convenient and stylish kitchen services the home and has been updated to ensure cooking meals is a breeze. A single car lock up garage and garden shed are located at the rear of the home and are accompanied by a grassed yard with ample space to enjoy the summer sun.
Externally the home sits on 544m2 (approx.) and provides a lovely front garden, all this with the added bonus of a corner block! Get in quick, an offer this good won't last long! Call to enquire today.

Description:
Location is the key
These near new townhouses are perfectly located and have been designed with minimal maintenance in mind. Situated approx. 300 meters from the Corio Village Shopping Centre, a short walk to the soon to be completed Barwon Health Medical Hub and a short drive to Geelong's CBD these townhouses make economic sense on all levels, whether you are a first home buyer, owner occupier or an investor looking for a secure investment. Both units are on their own title with private landscaped courtyards and offer 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances, light filled open plan living and each property has 3 split systems to provide year-round comfort. The location makes commuting a breeze with easy access to Princes Highway or North Shore Train Station approx. 2 km away. This fantastic opportunity awaits you, inspection is a must.
Unit 2: $296,000 - $325,000
Unit 3: $296,000 - $325,000
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
The ultimate entertainer in the ideal location.
Situated in this premier location and surrounded by beautiful homes is this stylish and charming property that provides a ready to move in lifestyle with class and with further potential to enhance and design to just the way you like it.
Immaculately preserved, this solid home is sure to impress the investor, growing family, or savvy renovator with free flowing floorplan, spacious entry that delivers impressive features from the wood fire heater, in ground swimming pool, gas heater, spacious laundry, timber floors, a large master bedroom (with ensuite) plus 3 further bedrooms (all with BIRs). Further highlights of the home include BBQ bench, outdoor alfresco area, three car carport, bungalow with ensuite, garden shed and an undercover entertaining area.
All of this on a 615m2 (approx.) allotment which provides easy access to local schools, cafes, shops, public transport & the Princes Highway for those who make the commute to Melbourne. Ideally situated for an easy and comfortable lifestyle. Call to enquire today!

Description:
Corner block prime for redevelopment
Developers, renovators and owner-occupiers rejoice, opportunities like this don't come along every day. This home is set on a rare 695sqm corner block and is packed full of renovation, redevelopment and subdivision potential (STCA). The current residence is presented in original condition and features one bathroom plus three bedrooms including the master with a built-in robe. A spacious and light-filled formal living zone is also on offer and features gas heating and air-conditioning while a combined kitchen and meals space offers plenty of storage. Outside, the large level corner block has a paved patio to host guests along with a garden shed, established gardens and a detached 3.4x7.6 garage. With so much space to work with, the opportunity to sub-divide and build a second dwelling is sure to excite. The property's prime location only adds to the appeal of this exciting opportunity with the Corio Village, primary and secondary schools and public transport options all within walking distance. There's also easy access to the Geelong Ring Road making for an easy commute north or south. Be quick or be disappointed.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Retreat style living.
Presenting this stylish, well positioned and extremely comfortable 4 bedroom home in the ever popular Cloverdale Estate. This property is the perfect mix of livability and affordable sophistication. Comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms, you will immediately fall in love with the natural light that beams through the open plan living/kitchen and dining area and with the added bonus of roller shutters on all windows throughout the home. An efficient floorplan with contemporary tones throughout makes it easy to see yourself living here. The kitchen boasts excellent storage, gas cooking and a pantry & breakfast bench; this is complimented by the central bathroom which is highlighted by floor to ceiling tiles. Other features of the home include 3 car carport (secure parking), garden shed and much much more. The location is just moments away from local schools, public transport, the North Shore train station & the Princes Highway for those who commute. Designed to make the ideal first home, comfortable downsizer or perfect investment. This stunning property has been designed to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle. Call to enquire today.

The entertainer's delight.
Introducing this beautifully designed three bedroom residence situated on a 613m2 (approx.) block with seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining.
The home comprises of a spacious light filled lounge area, ideal for large families, as well as 3 generous bedrooms with BIRs (master with ensuite). Offering additional extras such as a garden shed at the rear, air conditioning, double car garage, solar panels and much more, this home has been renovated to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle. Close to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters, what more could you ask for? Don't hesitate, secure this remarkable family home today.

Updated throughout and ready for you to move into and enjoy, this fantastic three bedroom home situated on a generous block represents an excellent opportunity to enter the market or invest in a growing area. Located within walking distance of Corio Central Shopping Centre and less than 5 minutes from either the Melbourne Road or Geelong Ring Road, this home provides easy access to Melbourne.
Situated on a plentiful 536m2 block (approx) with superior access to all the local amenities Corio has on offer, you'll discover this quality recently updated brick veneer home that's sure to tick all the boxes for both investors and home buyers alike.
Key Features
- Central Location
- 3 bedrooms with built-in robes
- Set on a 536m2 block (approx)
- Updated kitchen
- Fresh paint throughout
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Ideal for those seeking convenience.
Situated on a 590m2 (approx.) block and nestled amongst all wanted amenities this 3 bedroom home, plus bungalow, is sure to impress a range of buyers.
Comprising of 3 comfortable sized bedrooms (master with BIR), central bathroom, kitchen with gas cooking, meals area and separate laundry. Also offering under cover outdoor entertaining, storage shed, gas heater, split system air conditioning, spacious lockup garage and single car port.
Well located within moments to Corio Shopping Centre, local schools, public transport, Waterworld Leisure Centre and the Geelong Ring Road for those who commute.
Don't miss out on what this fantastic property has to offer!

Description:
Secure your future in Corio.
One look is all it will take to see all the potential packed into this impressive hidden gem. Whether you're dreaming of breaking into the property market, looking to start an investment portfolio or on the hunt for your next makeover project, this property will not disappoint! Consisting of four bedrooms, a central bathroom, spacious lounge area & neat kitchen with gas cooking. There is a delightful covered outdoor entertaining area which overlooks the large rear garden with a SLUG located to the side of the property. Set on approximately 617 square metres on a corner allotment the home is well located within walking distance to Hendy Reserve, primary schools and public transport. With the Corio Shopping Centre (a 5 minute drive) and the Geelong's CBD just a 14 minute commute down the Princes Highway, the home is easily accessible to most major amenities. If you're looking for potential-plus in a convenient location, then this property is the one for you. Inspect without delay!

Description:
Modern style home in the Cloverdale Estate.
Smart, fresh and built with quality, experience a luxurious low maintenance lifestyle with this modern three bedroom home in the sought after Cloverdale Estate.
Boasting strong contemporary appeal courtesy of its gorgeous polished timber floors, sleek kitchen with gas stove and electric oven. It's a home that's certainly high in style yet extremely low in maintenance, key requirements for the busy professional, investor or empty nester wishing to downsize while upgrading their lifestyle. Close to Corio Village, local shops and cafes, local schools, public transport and the Princes Highway for those who commute.
A deluxe kitchen with laminate benchtops and quality stainless steel appliances delivers a first-class cooking experience, while a spacious undercover entertaining area in the easy-care rear yard is ideal for enjoying your morning breakfast or BBQ gatherings with friends.
All robed bedrooms have floorboards for added luxury and comfort, while a generous front yard, stylish bathroom, laundry, split-system cooling, gas heating and single car garage adds further appeal to this already impressive residence. Offering all major amenities right at your door, a property this good won't last long. Call to inspect today!
Insights: 8 Dalwood Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Tucked away.
Classic homes like this don't come to market often so make sure you get in quick. Located in an ideal spot handy to all amenities which include local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and the Princes Highway for commuters. This light and bright 3 bedroom home is sure to be a winner once inspected. Beautifully designed with a free flowing floorplan offering a range of opportunities for the first home buyer, downsizer or investors alike, you won't be disappointed. Stepping inside the home you are immediately presented with the spacious yet comfortable living area directly across from the kitchen and meals area. A central bathroom services the home with separate laundry and toilet. For those that want to entertain family and friends you can easily do so with an enormous rear yard 738m2 (approx.). Further features include ducted heating, double carport, built in robes, air conditioning and much much more. Don't miss your chance to inspect today!
